meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>treasure</kanji> <kanji>stone</kanji> is a very valuable stone. What kind of stones are considered treasures? How about a <vocabulary>jewel</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>gem</vocabulary>?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
